>Construction of pLYC24
acquire oligo ZH30			
acquire oligo ZH31
acquire oligo ZH32
acquire oligo ZH33
acquire oligo G00101
acquire oligo ZH28
acquire plasmid pLYC18
acquire plasmid TPU4OFF
PCR ZH30,ZH31 on pLYC18	(4699 bp, pcrA)
PCR ZH32,ZH33 on pLYC18	(4753 bp, pcrB)
PCR G00101,ZH28 on TPU4OFF (226 bp, pcrC)
Assemble pcrA,pcrB,pcrC	(BsaI, pLYC24)
Transform pLYC24	(Mach1, Amp)
